title: RUMOURS: Costa hates life in England
text:
0 Jan 15, 2017 00:13:40 The Chelsea striker is looking to leave the Premier League as he does not enjoy living in England and will try to force his way out of Stamford Bridge 
Diego Costa hates life in England and is insistent on quitting Chelsea for a move away from the Premier League, according to the Sun . 
The 28-year-old was left out of the Blues' squad for their 3-0 win with Leicester City, but manager Antonio Conte insisted it was due to injury rather than a reported move to the Chinese Super League. 
Tianjin Quanjian are reported to be interested in bringing the Spain international to China on an Â£80 million deal, but despite Costa's desire to leave, Chelsea are not willing to sell their top scorer until the end of the season.
